transcript.title: Visit to Indonesia and Japan
transcript.content:
21 August 1996

I will visit Indonesia from 16 to 18 September and Japan firom 18 to 21 September.

Visits planned for earlier this month had to be cancelled for family reasons. I am very pleased that it has been possible to reschedule them so soon. Australia has important shared bilateral and regional interests with Indonesia and Japan. I look forward to discussing these in Jakarta with President Soeharto and in Tokyo with the Prime Minister, Mr Hashimoto.

21 August 1996
